Package de.lases.control.backing

Class SubmissionBacking

java.lang.Object
de.lases.control.backing.SubmissionBacking
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@ViewScoped @Named public class SubmissionBacking extends Object implements Serializable
Backing bean for the submission page.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • onLoad

      public void onLoad() throws IllegalAccessException
      Get the correct submission from the view param and load all data that should be displayed.
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException - If the user has no access rights for this submission

    • setState

      public void setState()
      Set the state of the submission, which can be SUBMITTED, REVISION_REQUIRED, REJECTED, ACCEPTED.

    • getReviewedBy

      public ReviewedBy getReviewedBy()

      Returns:
      Reviewed-by between the logged-in user and this submission.
